price: Onyankopͻn na ͻsoro ne asaase so ahennie wͻ no. Ɔde obi a Ɔpε bͻne kyε no, εna Ɔtwe obia Ɔpε nso aso. Onyankopͻn ne Bͻnefakyε Hene, Ɔne Mmͻborͻhunufoͻ Hene.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
